about_the_game:
The difference between the prologue version and the official version

  • Maps: The prologue will have 2 islands, the official version will have 5.

  • Crops: In the prologue you are limited to buying 3 additional crops in the collection tab.

  • Modes: Prologue will have normal mode, official will have expert, random and endless (once unlocked).

  • Collection: You will be able to spend gold on new avatars in the prologue.

  • Stats: Achievements and global rankings are not available in the prologue. Only in the official version.

  • Progress: All progress will carry over to the official version.

Each round you grow crops in a specific pattern. Planting them correctly will make them come to life!

After planting, move your vegetables strategically to fend off mice in Auto-Chess style.

Unlock multiple new crops! , avatars and tags.

5 different islands with unique bosses and enemies.

Unlock Expert Mode and Endless Mode.

Global rankings.

Achievements and progress tracking.

Endless strategy with random field layouts and special buff fields.

name: CROPS! Prologue
short_description: CROPS! is an autobattler in which your fruits and vegetables come alive! Plant your crops in specific patterns and place them strategically to defend against rats, kobolds and even dragons.
